title: Speedmaster Watch Face
summary: A dynamic and multifunctional watch face for sports enthusiasts
description: PLEASE NOTE:You will need to have Watchmaker Watch Face installed in order to use this interactive watch face for Android Wear.Round watch face only.Perfect for Moto 360, G Watch R and Huawei Watch!Energie-efficient Ambient Mode.The perfect watch face on the race track! Unique way to display milliseconds on an analog watch face.Design resembles dashboard of high performance supercars!Features:-stopwatch with milliseconds-battery percentage-analog and digital time-digital date-multiple color themes and customizationEasy to use:-Tap 10 to toggle between stopwatch milliseconds and battery percentage on bottom left watch face-Tap 2 to change color theme-Tap on LCD display to toggle between date and time-Tap bottom left watch face to start/stop stopwatch-Tap bottom right watch face to reset stopwatchStopwatch:-white arrow shows seconds-milliseconds on bottom left watch face-minutes on bottom right watch face
descriptionHTML:
PLEASE NOTE:
You will need to have Watchmaker Watch Face installed in order to use this interactive watch face for Android Wear.
Round watch face only.
Perfect for Moto 360, G Watch R and Huawei Watch!
Energie-efficient Ambient Mode.

The perfect watch face on the race track! Unique way to display milliseconds on an analog watch face.
Design resembles dashboard of high performance supercars!

Features:
-stopwatch with milliseconds
-battery percentage
-analog and digital time
-digital date
-multiple color themes and customization

Easy to use:
-Tap 10 to toggle between stopwatch milliseconds and battery percentage on bottom left watch face
-Tap 2 to change color theme
-Tap on LCD display to toggle between date and time
-Tap bottom left watch face to start/stop stopwatch
-Tap bottom right watch face to reset stopwatch

Stopwatch:
-white arrow shows seconds
-milliseconds on bottom left watch face
-minutes on bottom right watch face
